DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of this study are: 1. To determine the effect that an intensive, community dental clinic centered, stop-smoking program using a motivational interviewing approach has upon cessation rates for interested, smoking inner-city dental patients. 2. To determine the effect that providing a tooth whitening incentive, in a community dental clinic stop-smoking program, has upon cessation rates for interested, smoking inner-city dental patients.
DOC.brief_title: Prepare to Quit - A Clinical Trial to Help People Quit Smoking in a Community Dental Clinic Setting
DOC.criteria: current smoker dental clinic patient interested in quitting smoking minors those unable to provide own consent
